headline: 2000 - Meningococcal disease in Saudi Arabia and the Netherlands - Update
main_text: Saudi Arabia-Update: Health authorities have reported a revised total of 225 cases, including 57 deaths since the Haj last month.   Bacterial investigations have now confirmed Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A in 54 cases, serogroup W135 in 50 cases, and serogroup B in 1 case.  The situation is being closely monitored by the health authorities, with case management and contact tracing in place. Netherlands-Update: There have been 2 confirmed cases of N. meningitidis serogroup W135 and 2 probable cases, including 1 death reported.  Case management and contact tracing are also being carried out. Please see the previous report of meningococcal disease in these two countries.
